website_summaries.verdict: They're pricey, but these wolffish skins are a total win-win. They're a lean protein source for doggies on a diet, they're packed with Omega-3s, and they're good for teeth, too.
pros: One ingredient, so good choice for dogs with allergies
Require gnawing, so they promote good dental health and take a while to eat
Lean protein for dogs who require low-fat diet
A great choice for dogs who are aggressive chewers and need a positive outlet
cons: Manufacturer recommends cutting treats with scissors if you're concerned about a dog swallowing whole and choking

customer_reviews.title: Beams are incompatible in quality and chewability.
customer_reviews.text: My 13yr old Australian Cattle Dog has been getting a Beams' fish skin after dinner for over 6yrs and we love them. Some visitors have expressed a dislike of the fish smell, but we've never minded. The price has increased by almost 100% after a short period of inaccessible, but there are no others that compare in quality and chewability. I hope the price stabilizes soon, they are becoming exorbitant.
customer_reviews.author: jody Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Good product But expensive from amazon
customer_reviews.text: If you leave around Massachusetts you should go to pet supply plus this bag of treats over there cost 12 bucks per bag , I will not buy this again from amazon . Only comes 2 bags .
customer_reviews.author: Maior

customer_reviews.title: Good for their teeth.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, I have 3 large dogs so they are expensive, but I just give them once a week or so. I do wish they were more consistent on size, some are much larger than others.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them. They also did not swallow them and it kept the dogs from promptly coming back for more cause they actually had to chew. Grate healthy alternative and the fish was not fishy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Fish Sticks ( Honest Kitchen The Beams)
customer_reviews.text: These treats are very smelly but my dog thinks they're great. Every evening after a walk the dog stands in front of me and waits for the best part of the day. They take awhile to chew and she enjoys every bite. I think they help clean her teeth and are a healthy, not artificial , fairly low calorie treat.
customer_reviews.author: SARA ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to rawhide chews
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. All natural and keeps them occupied for a while. I nice alternative to rawhide chews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin, Teeth, overall Health 👍😊
customer_reviews.text: This is a very healthy treat for your dog crate for teeth great for skin great taste my body loves it ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rj Varnadore

customer_reviews.title: you cant cut these in half without a band saw
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these. I think they are awesome treats, but some of the really wide skins are just too big. They are IMPOSSIBLE to cut.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE

customer_reviews.title: Quantity
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get 2 but only received one :( One was for a gift. The last time I bought them at this price it was for two. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Muggas

customer_reviews.title: It smells good, but my dog doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: smells really good. But my dog don’t even touch them, My dog sniffed and went away.. waste my money..
customer_reviews.author: ChoChoCho

customer_reviews.title: What you need to know
customer_reviews.text: So I was expecting 12 oz of these which would be 2/6 Oz packages but when I arrived at my door was one 6 oz package the description is definitely wrong there seems to be some discrepancies with the reviews as to what you actually receive so here's what I got don't be fooled by the product description normally I absolutely love giving these to my dog and she loves to eat them normally I would pay this price for two packages not one
customer_reviews.author: az me

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.  Dog chewed through it very fast like a snack stick.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the cost. Dog chewed through it very fast like a snack stick. They are very thin and easily chewed. The cost is extremely high for the amount that is in a package.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: DOUBLED IN PRICE?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from Amazon about 3 months back. Our Rufus loves them! Unfortunately, the price on them has gone up way too much to be able to afford them. Shame, really.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McDonald

product_meta.title: Honest Kitchen The Beams
product_meta.description: Beams made with just one ingredient—pristine wild caught fish skins. These savory, chewy sticks are guaranteed to satisfy the pickiest of pups. The act of gnawing on these longer lasting chews can help maintain tip-top dental health too. A solid source of lean protein and Omega-3s, it's no wonder these are our best-selling treats!.
feature_bullets: JUST ONE INGREDIENT: This high protein dog chew is made with only dehydrated wild caught fish and loaded with Omega-3s.
DENTAL DOG TREAT: Gnawing on these longer lasting dental chews can help clean teeth and support healthy gums.
HUMAN GRADE: The Honest Kitchen meets the rigorous FDA safety standards to use the label 'human grade', ensuring the highest quality dog treats.
ALL NATURAL: This healthy dog chew is made with no by-products, preservatives or fillers and is Non-GMO Project verified.
MADE IN THE USA: Processed in the USA in a human grade food processing facility with nothing from China.
